Man, this really Is good, my friend HentaiCrepes already left a great review so I don't have to say much, since all the points he's making I'd have said mostly the same, but I'll still give you all my opinion on this.

Generally speaking this Is the first work of his I've read, and It Is fantastic It, I've always been a fan of Lewd Shota's and this one certainly is a find which I haven't seen for quite some time, the art style Is smooth yet has that edge to make It feel authentic, the sex scenes are cute and pretty, and the best part Is It's not some ugly fucker having sex with a cute shota. I am however disappointed that there was no blowjob scene, It always pains me when I do not see one, since for me It makes or breaks a hentai on many levels, but (no pun intended) the butt-sex was fantastic, so I overall rate this work 8.5/10, excellent work, but sadly no blowjob scene.

Yey new Tekuron! and damn do I love this! the detail put into the asshole, dick, nipples and other body parts is fantastic https://nhentai.net/g/242164/3/ just look at how nice and smooth that body looks! And the drawings look less rough compared to his previous works especially SekuCaba https://nhentai.net/g/227508/ and I really love the angles and panels they look damn amazing and dynamic especially the shots of the ass in page 11 it really adds intensity and impact to the scene, and man do I love the chemistry between the 2, I wish I had someone who'd let me fuck him/her and call me oniichan too! anyways Tekuron really did well here the artwork looks way more detailed and smooth compared to his previous works and the scenes are handled in a way that really feels genuinely sexy and I'm giving this one a 9/10.
